meta.name: CrimeCall
meta.description: The series will focus on crime re-constructions (mini dramas), features and CCTV. The Gardai will play an onscreen presence, with some of their own "boys and girls in blue" presenting segments of the programme, and a bank of Gardai who will take calls from the public as the programme airs.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Presenter Carla O'Brien with reconstructions, CCTV footage and live studio appeals for information from the public, to help with Garda investigations.
